text: So pe: “Ta ni Oluwa awon sanmo ati ile?” So pe: “Allahu ni.” So pe: “Se leyin Re ni e tun mu awon alafeyinti kan, ti won ko ni ikapa oore ati inira fun emi ara won?” So pe: “Se afoju ati oluriran dogba bi? Tabi awon okunkun ati imole dogba? Tabi won yoo fun Allahu ni awon akegbe kan ti awon naa da eda bii ti eda Re, (to bee ge) ti eda fi jora won loju won?” So pe: “Allahu ni Eledaa gbogbo nnkan. Oun si ni Okan soso, Olubori
